00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00008 #include "errors.h"
00009 #include "ini.h"
00010 
00011 void readINI(MavenCompiler* c) {
00012         ifstream ifile;
00013         string maven_ini_location = locateMavenINI(c);
00014         
00015         // we need the maven.ini
00016         if(maven_ini_location == "") {
00017                 pushError(c, "maven.ini could not be located");
00018                 return;
00019         }
00020         
00021         ifile.open(maven_ini_location.c_str());
00022         if(!ifile.is_open()) {
00023                 pushWarning(c, "Can't open %s", maven_ini_location);
00024                 return;
00025         }
00026         
00027         string line = "", header = "";
00028         while(!ifile.eof()) {
00029                 char ch = ifile.get();
00030                 
00031                 if(ch == '\n') {
00032                         evalINILine(c, line, header);
00033                         line = "";
00034                 } else line += ch;
00035         }
00036 }
